stanza.line: Like as the waves make towards the pebbled shoreshore
So do our minutes hasten to their endend
Each changing place with that which goes beforebefore
In sequent toil all forwards do contendcontend
Nativity once in the main of lightlight
Crawls to maturity wherewith being crownedcrowned
Crooked eclipses gainst his glory fightfight
And Time that gave doth now his gift confoundconfound
Time doth transfix the flourish set on youthyouth
And delves the parallels in beauty browbrow
Feeds on the rarities of nature truthtruth
And nothing stands but for his scythe to mowmow
And yet to times in hope my verse shall standstand
Praising thy worth despite his cruel handhand
